reviews.review: Awesome game.
Realmente es un JUEGAZO, me encanto como valve salio de su zona de confort para crear un juego de este estilo y con una historia fuertemente intrigante, lo recomiendo totalmente :).

포탈이 어떤 게임인지 전혀 모르던 상태로 접했기 때문에 포탈건을 이용한 방탈출 게임이라는 걸 뒤늦게 알았습니다. ㅋㅋ 중력이건 내던지기건 생소한 것들 투성이라 재밌었네요. 19라운드까지 탈출하면 게임 엔딩인 줄 알고 멍때렷는데 사실 그건 다 튜토리얼이고 진짜는 그 후부터가 시작입니다. 잼습니다. 갠적으로 19라운드 이후를 상상하질 못해서 반전 때문에 더 재밋엇네여! 반전이라고 한게 스포일라나용 ㅎㅎㅎ 잼섯습니다. 포탈2가 더 갓겜이라던데 기대되네요!

Recomandadíssimo!!! Valeu totalmente a pena ter comprado e vale zerar tbm! No começo tu vai pensar que é tudo monótono e tals, mas no final (PRINCIPALMENTE se você entender inglês) irá valer muito a pena.
Pra você que ta pensando em comprar Portal... Compra, só compra, é muito bom.
este juego es una maravilla, enserio lo recomiendo.

While the game is fun, the main story is VERY short. It's definitely not worth the normal price, but it's on sale quite often (I wouldn't buy it for more than the 90% reduced price, though that depends on how stingy you are).

I enjoyed the game, but I definitely can't agree with other reviews that call this game a master piece. It's entertaining and some of the writing is funny, but it's not very challenging (except for one or two parts where the true challenge is actually finding the door) and if we're all honest: Glados is funny, but not as funny as people make her out to be. 

The main charm of the game is the use of the portals (which was novel when the game released), but isn't used as much as would have been possible and boils down to only a few techniques that can be used to solve all puzzles.
The original Puzzle Platformer....but still waste of good source engine.
dumbledore dies
yes

Jogo sensacional, começa uma saga de maneira simples de claro baixo orçamento mas com uma gameplay maravilhosa, porem receio que as mecanicas do plot deveriam ser mais exploradas nesse jogo inicial, o segundo jogo teve que forçar mais a barra enquanto tem uma história muito mais profundo e ao mesmo tempo tendo de incluir varias novas mecanicas que ja poderiam ser adicionadas no primeiro jogo.
The cake isn't a lie.
The game hasn't really aged; if you haven't played it yet, what are you waiting for? Masterpiece.
I fully enjoyed every second i played! Puzzles are fun to solve because they are not too easy and not too hard. I really recommend playing this game!

Just completed the 19 levels within a day. Truly did not disappoint. Good price in 2018.
Portal oyunu oynadigim en guzel oyunlardan birisi.

This game was the first Steam game I ever bought, before I played Portal I really wanted to try undertale, but after playing this I kinda forgot about undertale altogether. This game is an excellent experience for sure - it teaches you the base mechanics of the game through the test chambers and by the time you get to the end (no spoilers) you can easily solve any problem given to you and solving new problems is even more satisfying. The story itself is simple (no spoilers) but it is responsible for my favourite bit of the game.

So if you are thinking of buying this game then do, because it is a great game that deserves its cult status and sequel!

Portal is a smart and fun puzzle game, which EVERYONE has to try. (It’s like, 1 dollar on sale) This game gives you approximately 3 hours of fun and challenging gameplay, and if you finished that you can do Challenges and stuff. If you played this one, Portal 2 is just as good (if not better) than this one, so go get that one too!

Overall Portal recieves a BIG EXTRA  T H I C C  A+.

Sinceramente, comprei portal pelo fato de ser um dos únicos jogos bons de verdade que rodavam no meu notebook, e admito que subestimei o primeiro jogo. Se eu recomendo? Com todo o meu coração, sim. O jogo pode ser resumido em uma palavra: ÚNICO. Tudo nele, do design até a história, não dava pra esperar menos da Valve. Pra você que proucura jogos leves, jogar portal não é menos que sua obrigação. Recomendo a todos.
It's about the fourth the size of portal two. If you binge rick and morty, it takes 2 hours... and that is trying to get yourself stuck in every room. AN EMERGENCY ESCAPE HATCH WILL OPEN

Portal is a funny puzzle-platform in first person shooter that you create two portals one is colour orange and another one is blue of course you use a portal gun to do it, you must solve a simple test but after it becomes hard and you must use your mind to solve the puzzle and progress on the game.
+ Good graphics with Source Engine.
+ Good gameplay.
+ and funny physics like it was on Half-Life 2.

游戏整体素质不错，需要玩家多动脑筋，反复尝试，也考验一点动手操作能力。
故事背景没有平铺直叙地讲出来，得玩家从含蓄的表达中自行领会。神秘感很强，后期略惊悚。
提醒新玩家一定要在音频设置里把字幕开启，方便理解剧情。
This was a triumph.
this is actually one of the best games i've ever played. i'm incredibly bad at puzzles so it took me a while to complete, but oh boy was it fun.

Daha önce Portal tarzı oyunlarla iligli deneyimim olmamıştı ve çok fazla haz aldığım bir tür değildi. Buna rağmen Valvenin indirimli setinden çıkınca kurup oynamaya karar verdim ve kesinlikle pişman olmadım. Oyun sürem henüz çok fazla değil ancak oynadıkça yeni bölümler sizi içine çekiyor. Daha fazla kafa yormanız ve çözüm yoluna ulaşmanız gerekiyor. Öyle saatlerdce başından kalkmadan oynanacak bir oyun değil belki ama kafanızı boşaltmak istediğinizde oyuna girdiğinizde bir nebze de olsa sıkıntılarınızdan uzaklaştırıp oyunun atmosferi içinde bulmacaları çözmeye çalışırken buluyorsunuz kendinizi. Bu yönüyle alınabilecek bir oyun. Tavsiye edilir. Oyunu valvenin setinde indirimdeyken 3 liraya alabilirsiniz. Set Hilf-Life, Portal, TeamForest falan eski oyunları bir araya toplamış. Fiyat olarak önemsenmeyecek bir tutar olduğundan içiniz rahat olsun her tütlü tatmin eder.

Крутая игра, купил из-за пака "Orange Box" ,который здесь же и находится и который по скидке в -90%, со стоимостю в 27 грн/54 рубля.
И за эти копейки ты получаешь Half-Life 2 с эпизодами и DLC, ну и конечно же Portal.
[spoiler]P.S: все игры в паке по отдельности со скидками стоят 195 грн/390 рублей!!![/spoiler]

SKIT BRA SPEL, PROVA!!!!!

Portal, el original.

Puedo decir sin miedo a equivocarme que este es el juego de puzles mas original que he podido jugar en toda mi vida, un juego que, tu eres la pieza del rompecabezas y a su vez, eres el que mueve las piezas. Un juego que, no puedo resumir la historia, mejor jugarla por tu cuenta.

Es muy corto, en 2 horas te lo puedes terminar facilmente y recomiendo comprarlo de oferta ya que suele estar en el 90% de descuento.

Un juego OBLIGATORIO para todos los amantes de los puzles que te daran horas de entretenimuento y puede que te haga pensar un poco, una mecanica bastante curiosa e interesante, a parte de genial, con una historia que te empuja a mirar hacia delante y terminartelo, junto con un villano carismatico y que le cogeras un gran amor-odio
